constraints_details.result: Hinterland Lower Lea Valley including Stratford

description: Alterations in the course of construction to the scheme granted planning permission on 18 June 2004 (PA/02/01103) for the erection of 3 residential blocks,  4-6 storeys in height, in connection with the use of the site as 3 studio, 67 one-bedroom and 33 two-bedroom residential units together with provision of a landscaped courtyard and parking facilities.  The alterations relate to the mix and number of units proposed (now 104 units made up of 63 one-bedroom, 39 two-bedroom and 2 three-bedroom units); one additional parking bay being proposed (now 17 bays); a new switch store, railings, recycling bin store being provided; Block Two moving 0.5m away from the William Guy boundary; plus alterations to entrances and windows.
